title: Can’t wait - Part 2
body:
Universe: Harry Potter (Marauders era)

Paring: Sirius Black x Female reader

Warning: Angst, swearing, fluff

Words: 1661

Y/N’s POV

Everything seems to be in slow motion. I can still feel the tears running down my face and I can still hear Sirius’s pleas for me to come back ringing in my ears. I give the password to the fat lady and try and rush myself up the stairs towards my dorm, clearly not wanting to talk to anyone, unfortunately, that doesn’t stop James Potter. I feel him grab my wrist and lightly pull me of the steps and towards him. “Hey, what’s wrong?” He looks at me with sympathy “come sit down with us” he refers to Lupin and Pettigrew. I hesitate, what if Sirius comes back? I don’t even know them that well, why would they want to comfort me?

“Is this what I think it’s about?” Remus drags me out of my thoughts, “what do you think it’s about?” I ask “Sirius.” Remus says it without even thinking twice. “Well, you’re correct” I mumble “What did the fool do this time?” James rolls his eyes “Well I’m guessing you guys know about him asking me out to Hogsmeade right?” “Unfortunately, He came back to the dorm afterwards all sooky after you had said that you’ll think about it” Remus snickered “Well I find that hard to believe” I scoff “What do you mean?” James looks at me confused “I was walking around the castle trying to find him and I saw him asking another girl out, mind him I was actually going to tell him that my answer was yes” I laugh halfheartedly “That fucking twat” James sighs while shaking his head. “Wait a minute he did what!” Lily was walking down the stairs presumably having heard the noise I made trying to get up the stairs, I look up at her and she immediately gave me a hug. “You guys go find Sirius and figure out what the hell he was thinking and I’ll stay here with Y/N” Lily explained while still hugging me, the boys complied and left to find Sirius, leaving me and Lily alone.

Sirius’s POV

I’m still sitting on the floor of the corridor, for some reason I feel like I can’t move, I can still hear her yelling at me, I can still feel where her hands pushed me, I can still see the tears streaming down her face and there are no words that can explain how horrible I feel for being the cause of them, What the fuck have I done? I hear footsteps coming towards me and I look up hoping it’s her. Never in my life have I been disappointed to see my best friends, I guess there’s a first time for everything.

“Are you out of you fucking mind Sirius?” James yells, Remus and Peter all following closely behind him, “Are you really that daft?! We all know how deeply you feel for her” I’ve never seen James so frustrated, “I’m afraid I have to agree with James, you really fucked this one up” Remus said with sympathy “You don’t think I know that? I know I fucked up, I know I hurt her and there’s probably nothing I can do to fix it” I put my head back down on my knees, “Well there could be a way” Remus sits down next to me, James is still standing in front of me with Peter, both of them looking down at me with pity. “Oh yeah? And what could that be?” I laugh knowing that nothing will probably work. “Talk to her.” Remus says it like it’s nothing “explain to her why you did it. IF you have a good enough reason that is” James adds, Peter has stayed quiet the whole time, the poor boy was always so awkward. “What if it doesn’t work?” I ask it’s a death wish considering the last time I talked to her it ended in heartbreak. “There’s only one way to find out” James looks at me.

Y/N’s POV

Lily and I were talking about our plans for the holidays, trying to keep my mind away from Sirius when James, Remus and Peter walk back in, James beckons me to follow him while the other boys continue to the couch were Lily is sat. I follow him thinking he was going to talk to me I’m private about what he talked about with Sirius, as we walk out of the common room I’m faced with Sirius himself leaning against the opposite wall. Fuck.

“I’ll leave you guys to it” James turns around and walks back into the common room. I can’t stop looking at him, he clearly wasn’t doing well either. “Hey…” he mumbles shyly, something you very rarely see from Sirius. “Hey? That’s all you’ve got to say?” I look at him, he winces. “I wanted to explain myself” he sniffled “Well go on then” I looked at him expectantly, he cleared his throat “I umm I was trying to protect myself as I said earlier, I didn’t want to get hurt and that was the only thing I thought of” he looked down in shame. “Well, now we’re both hurt” I huffed. “I know and it’s the worst mistake I’ve ever made” he rasped “Well you still made it” I jabbed “I know but can’t you see I’m trying to make it better? We are clearly both miserable” he moved closer to me, he did look horrible and I guess I looked the same but we wouldn’t be in this situation if he had just waited… “What are you trying to say, Sirius? Because if you’re saying I should give you another chance… the whole reason I asked if I could think about my answer was so I could see what your intentions were and they clearly weren’t good.” I turn to walk back into the common room and I feel him roughly pull my upper arm. “What!”

Sirius’s POV

She was leaving, I had to think of something quick, so, I kissed her. She was shocked but eventually, she kissed me back. She wrapped her arms around my waist, and while mine stayed on her face (A/n See GIF for reference) For a moment I felt like everything would be okay but I know after this I’m going to have to work my ass off for her to forgive me but for her it’ll be worth it all.

Y/N’s POV

We pulled away from the kiss slowly, I didn’t want it to end. I was still clinging to his waist while his hands had moved from my face to my shoulders to look at me properly.

“Listen Y/N I like you, a lot. More than I’ve ever liked anyone and I’m willing to do whatever will help you forgive me. I want to be with you and only you and I know it may seem hard to believe at the moment but it’s true” he looked like he was going to cry again, I just looked at him. “Sirius I don’t know what to say…” I stammered “Please, just say you’ll give me a chance” he pleaded, all of a sudden he was on his knees holding my hands “Y/N please, I’m begging you. I need you to give me another chance, I know I won’t screw this one up, please” I giggled, his face instantly lit up “I guess I’ll give you another chance” “YES!” He jumped up and started peppering kisses on my face “You won’t regret I promise you” he had the biggest grin on his face “On one circumstance” his face dropped “No more chances after this, if you fuck up again that’s it” I say sternly “Yes, of course, anything you want” he immediately agreed. “I promise you, you won’t regret it” He grinned while pulling me into a hug.

Lily’s POV

“What do you think is happening out there” I wondered out loud “Hopefully they aren’t shagging” James laughed “let’s go have a look shall we” James continued “After you mentioned shagging I really don’t want to” Remus grimaced “Stop being a pussy Moony, Lily and Peter will come with me right? ” James chuckled, I rolled my eyes and Peter immediately stood up and stood by James “Come on, You know Y/N is too sensible to do anything like that. Well… at least for now” James smirked “Oh whatever, come on Remus” I huffed and stood up, walking towards the portrait “We have to be quiet, I don’t want to ruin a possible moment they’re having” I whisper. “Love, you should know by now that I’m great at being sneaky” James winked “Call me Love again and I’ll make sure you won’t be able to move for a week” I threated “Wow, no need to get violent Lily flower” I rolled my eyes, reaching to open the portrait “Just be quite the both of you” Remus scolded. I opened the portrait slowly, trying to make the least amount of noise possible, I made sure it was open wide enough so everyone could see. “Oh my god, that is the cutest thing I’ve ever seen” James swooned. Sirius and Y/N were just standing in the corridor hugging, I felt weird on intruding on an intimate moment like this but I was just so happy for my best friend.

Y/N’s POV

“They’re watching us” Sirius whispered, “I know, they aren’t very secretive are they?” We could both hear them giggling from the portrait. “Just ignore them” he purred while pulling me closer. I finally felt happy, “You know, I’m never letting you go. You’re stuck with me forever now.” he teased “I know.” I smiled.

A/n: Hey! I want to thank everyone who liked, reblogged, etc etc, also if you guys have any requests for other stories/series please don’t be afraid to request them! Once again a huge thank you to everyone that read Can’t wait, I wasn’t expecting for people to like it at all! 

tagged: @hello-fanfiction-goodbye-grades

IF you have a good enough reason that is” James adds, Peter has stayed quiet the whole time, the poor boy was always so awkward. “What if it doesn’t work?” I ask it’s a death wish considering the last time I talked to her it ended in heartbreak. “There’s only one way to find out” James looks at me.

Y/N’s POV

Lily and I were talking about our plans for the holidays, trying to keep my mind away from Sirius when James, Remus and Peter walk back in, James beckons me to follow him while the other boys continue to the couch were Lily is sat. I follow him thinking he was going to talk to me I’m private about what he talked about with Sirius, as we walk out of the common room I’m faced with Sirius himself leaning against the opposite wall. Fuck.

“I’ll leave you guys to it” James turns around and walks back into the common room. I can’t stop looking at him, he clearly wasn’t doing well either. “Hey…” he mumbles shyly, something you very rarely see from Sirius. “Hey? That’s all you’ve got to say?” I look at him, he winces. “I wanted to explain myself” he sniffled “Well go on then” I looked at him expectantly, he cleared his throat “I umm I was trying to protect myself as I said earlier, I didn’t want to get hurt and that was the only thing I thought of” he looked down in shame. “Well, now we’re both hurt” I huffed. “I know and it’s the worst mistake I’ve ever made” he rasped “Well you still made it” I jabbed “I know but can’t you see I’m trying to make it better? We are clearly both miserable” he moved closer to me, he did look horrible and I guess I looked the same but we wouldn’t be in this situation if he had just waited… “What are you trying to say, Sirius? Because if you’re saying I should give you another chance… the whole reason I asked if I could think about my answer was so I could see what your intentions were and they clearly weren’t good.” I turn to walk back into the common room and I feel him roughly pull my upper arm. “What!”

Sirius’s POV

She was leaving, I had to think of something quick, so, I kissed her. She was shocked but eventually, she kissed me back. She wrapped her arms around my waist, and while mine stayed on her face (A/n See GIF for reference) For a moment I felt like everything would be okay but I know after this I’m going to have to work my ass off for her to forgive me but for her it’ll be worth it all.

Y/N’s POV

We pulled away from the kiss slowly, I didn’t want it to end. I was still clinging to his waist while his hands had moved from my face to my shoulders to look at me properly.

“Listen Y/N I like you, a lot. More than I’ve ever liked anyone and I’m willing to do whatever will help you forgive me. I want to be with you and only you and I know it may seem hard to believe at the moment but it’s true” he looked like he was going to cry again, I just looked at him. “Sirius I don’t know what to say…” I stammered “Please, just say you’ll give me a chance” he pleaded, all of a sudden he was on his knees holding my hands “Y/N please, I’m begging you. I need you to give me another chance, I know I won’t screw this one up, please” I giggled, his face instantly lit up “I guess I’ll give you another chance” “YES!” He jumped up and started peppering kisses on my face “You won’t regret I promise you” he had the biggest grin on his face “On one circumstance” his face dropped “No more chances after this, if you fuck up again that’s it” I say sternly “Yes, of course, anything you want” he immediately agreed. “I promise you, you won’t regret it” He grinned while pulling me into a hug.

Lily’s POV

“What do you think is happening out there” I wondered out loud “Hopefully they aren’t shagging” James laughed “let’s go have a look shall we” James continued “After you mentioned shagging I really don’t want to” Remus grimaced “Stop being a pussy Moony, Lily and Peter will come with me right? ” James chuckled, I rolled my eyes and Peter immediately stood up and stood by James “Come on, You know Y/N is too sensible to do anything like that. Well… at least for now” James smirked “Oh whatever, come on Remus” I huffed and stood up, walking towards the portrait “We have to be quiet, I don’t want to ruin a possible moment they’re having” I whisper. “Love, you should know by now that I’m great at being sneaky” James winked “Call me Love again and I’ll make sure you won’t be able to move for a week” I threated “Wow, no need to get violent Lily flower” I rolled my eyes, reaching to open the portrait “Just be quite the both of you” Remus scolded. I opened the portrait slowly, trying to make the least amount of noise possible, I made sure it was open wide enough so everyone could see. “Oh my god, that is the cutest thing I’ve ever seen” James swooned. Sirius and Y/N were just standing in the corridor hugging, I felt weird on intruding on an intimate moment like this but I was just so happy for my best friend.

Y/N’s POV

“They’re watching us” Sirius whispered, “I know, they aren’t very secretive are they?” We could both hear them giggling from the portrait. “Just ignore them” he purred while pulling me closer. I finally felt happy, “You know, I’m never letting you go. You’re stuck with me forever now.” he teased “I know.” I smiled.

A/n: Hey! I want to thank everyone who liked, reblogged, etc etc, also if you guys have any requests for other stories/series please don’t be afraid to request them! Once again a huge thank you to everyone that read Can’t wait, I wasn’t expecting for people to like it at all!

Universe: Harry Potter (Marauders era)

Paring: Sirius Black x Female reader

Warning: Angst, swearing, fluff

Words: 1661

Y/N’s POV

Everything seems to be in slow motion. I can still feel the tears running down my face and I can still hear Sirius’s pleas for me to come back ringing in my ears. I give the password to the fat lady and try and rush myself up the stairs towards my dorm, clearly not wanting to talk to anyone, unfortunately, that doesn’t stop James Potter. I feel him grab my wrist and lightly pull me of the steps and towards him. “Hey, what’s wrong?” He looks at me with sympathy “come sit down with us” he refers to Lupin and Pettigrew. I hesitate, what if Sirius comes back? I don’t even know them that well, why would they want to comfort me?

summary: "You took my son to get his tongue pierced?!" -Draco 😃 Congratualtions!
question: "You took my son to get his tongue pierced?!" -Draco 😃 Congratualtions!
answer:
Ever since they had started dating, Harry’s son and Scorpius Malfoy were even more inseparable than before. Barely a day went past when they weren’t either Flooing to each other’s house or asking when they could next Floo to each other’s house. Harry didn’t mind Scorpius Malfoy being around so much more - he was polite and friendly and he made Albus so happy - but interacting with Draco so much more took a bit of getting used to.

Harry was always hyper aware of ensuring Scorpius’ safety and wellbeing when he was under the Potter roof. Draco would have his head if anything were to happen to his precious son while he was under Harry’s care. But seeing as the boys liked it best when they were simply in Albus’ room, or in the garden, Harry didn’t have much to worry about.

Towards the end of the summer, Harry agreed to take Albus and Lily school shopping and Albus had immediately asked if Scorpius could come with them. Harry wasn’t sure Draco would be okay with that, whether he’d want to take Scorpius school shopping himself, but he’d written a letter all the same.

Draco’s short reply had been a slightly disparaging comment about how he’d already been organised enough to take his son shopping for school supplies but that Scorpius would love to accompany them nonetheless and thanking Harry and Albus for the invitation. They’d Flooed into the Leaky Cauldron to find an excited Scorpius and a bemused Draco, who sent Scorpius off with a brief hug, promising to pick him up later.

That had been several hours ago and Harry was now in a cafe with his daughter, a large coffee and an enormous slab of Victoria sponge he could have sworn he was going to say no to. Lily nibbled at the cake, sipped the Frappuccino she’d ordered and chattered away. His school essentials purchased, Albus had long since shaken him off and was somewhere in the alley with Scorpius and strict instructions to stay there.

It had been a very successful morning. Albus had only needed new robes and a couple of new books for his NEWT subjects; Harry gave him some gold to top up his own potions kit, knowing they’d be in the Apothecary for hours otherwise. Lily had asked no less than seventeen times for another pygmy puff and had spent almost half an hour choosing some new hair accessories which coordinated with her Hogwarts robes but didn’t clash with her hair.

Harry’s serene bubble of success was burst when an irate looking Draco Malfoy appeared in the coffee shop, bypassed the counter and took about three strides to approach Harry, his expression furious.

“Potter, what did you do?”

Lily snorted into her slice of cake and Harry threw her a warning look.

“What’s the matter?” Harry gestured to the spare chair at their table but Draco did not sit down.

“Do you know where our sons have been?”

Harry was confused. Was Draco annoyed at him for letting Albus and Scorpius off on their own? Scorpius was only months away from turning seventeen and it wasn’t like they were off gallivanting around muggle London together, the alley was very safe. But Harry was suddenly worried he’d misjudged the situation and that Draco would never have let Scorpius leave by himself.

“Look, I’m sorry, Draco, but they were getting bored of me hanging around and where they’re both almost of age, I thought it would be okay if-“ Harry stopped. “Hang on, what are you doing here anyway?”

“I happened to have tasks to complete here,” Draco said cryptically. “I saw Scorpius and Albus as I was passing.”

“Draco, it’s very safe here, and-“

“No, Potter, that’s not where my concern lies.”

“Where does your concern lie?” Harry asked warily.

“I have just seen Scorpius and your son leaving a tattoo shop.” He left a dramatic pause.

Lily gasped gleefully. “Ooh is Albus getting a tattoo? Can I get one, Dad?”

“What?” Harry stared at Draco in confusion. “Albus wouldn’t have got a tattoo, would he, Lil?”

Lily shrugged and ate some more cake.

“Maybe it would be wise to check what they’re up to?” Draco gestured for them to leave and Harry looked at Lily.

“I want to see!” she cried enthusiastically.

“There won’t be anything to see, Albus hasn’t got a tattoo. He hasn’t,” Harry insisted.

“Maybe Scorpius has, then,” Lily said off handedly and Draco turned pink.

“No, no, Scorpius has not…” Draco muttered to himself reassuringly, striding along the cobbled street determinedly.

Draco was on such a mission that he didn’t notice Albus sat outside Florean Fortescue’s giving them a cheery wave.

“Oh hi, Dad, Lil. Hello, Mr Malfoy.” He smiled innocently while all three of them scrutinised him for evidence of a tattoo. “What?” he asked in concern after a second, playing with his hair like there might be something wrong with it and that’s what they were all staring at.

“Er, what have you been up to?” Harry asked jovially.

Albus shrugged. “Been here and there, now we’re getting milkshakes.”

“Here and there…” Draco muttered.

“Um,” Harry cleared his throat, “Draco seems to think he saw you and Scorpius leaving a tattoo parlour.”

“What tattoo did you get, Al?” Lily cried happily, joining him at the small table. “Show me! Or was it Scorpius?” She got up on her knees to try and look inside the ice cream shop.

Albus laughed. “Nobody got a tattoo.”

Harry relaxed and he saw Draco’s tense shoulders release slightly.

“What were you doing in that shop then?”

Albus shrugged. “Scor got his tongue pierced.”

Harry felt his stomach drop, his heart stop and his face redden. Draco would never, ever forgive him for this. Harry chanced a glance over at his old school enemy, now sort of friend. Probably not friend anymore.

“You took my son to get his tongue pierced?!”

It wasn’t clear whether the question was aimed at Harry or Albus, but as Albus was his son, Harry felt told off either way.

“Why did… how… how did that happen?” Harry was willing Albus with his eyes not to say he’d talked Scorpius into it.

Albus shrugged again, the epitome of nonchalance. “He’s wanted it done for ages.”

Draco spluttered in protest. “He’s never expressed any desire to do that before!”

At that moment, Scorpius emerged from the shop with a milkshake in each hand. He set them down at the table with a cheerful grin, which quickly turned to mild confusion when he spotted his dad’s expression. Harry wondered if Scorpius had deliberately waited for today to go off and do this without his dad being able to stop him.

“Hi, Dad. What are you doing here?”

Scorpius looked breezy and casual, no trace of guilt or suspicion on his face. Harry watched his tongue as he talked, looking for the flash of silver.

“Scorpius,” Draco spluttered again, apparently unable to say anything else.

Scorpius glanced at Albus who looked blank then at Lily, who was gazing at Scorpius in impressed admiration. Harry hoped she wasn’t getting any ideas.

“Albus told your dad what you did,” Harry said when it didn’t look like anybody was going to say anything.

“What I… did?” Scorpius looked anguished, as if he were trying to work out what he’d done wrong. He was gaping a bit in confusion and, almost immediately, it was clearly visible that he didn’t have a tongue piercing.

It was then that he realised that - while he was appraising Scorpius - Draco was watching Albus. Albus, who was now sipping his milkshake with a poorly concealed grin on his face, as if he were about to burst out laughing. Because Scorpius hadn’t pierced his tongue at all.

Harry looked from his son to his old rival, something passing between them which he wasn’t fully reading. Draco raised his eyebrows, then smirked, just with the corner of his mouth. Albus winked at him and the two gave almost identical snorts of laughter.

“Can someone explain to me what’s going on?” Lily said in a loud, bored voice.

“I think maybe it’s a Slytherin thing,” Harry commented, grinning at Albus.

Scorpius cleared his throat. “Hello, yes, um, I’m a Slytherin too and I’m also a bit lost.”

“Why were you in a tattoo shop then?” Draco asked Albus.

“Seeing how much it would cost to get my ears pierced, can’t go on my own until I’m seventeen anyway.” Albus fiddled with his ear lobe experimentally. “Can I do it, Dad?”

“Er, let’s discuss it at home with your mum,” Harry said non-commitally.

“I told you he’d say that,” Albus said quietly to Scorpius.

“What did you tell my dad I did?” Scorpius was still stuck in mild confusion. “Dad?” He turned to Draco.

“You knew I’d say that?” Harry pressed Albus. “We’ve never talked about it before.”

“Nothing, Scorpius. Just Albus’ idea of a hilarious joke.” Draco spoke at the same time.

“So Scorpius didn’t get his tongue pierced? Dad, can I get my tongue pierced?” Lily interrupted.

Scorpius’ face was a picture as it dawned on him what Albus had said.

Towards the end of the summer, Harry agreed to take Albus and Lily school shopping and Albus had immediately asked if Scorpius could come with them. Harry wasn’t sure Draco would be okay with that, whether he’d want to take Scorpius school shopping himself, but he’d written a letter all the same.

Draco’s short reply had been a slightly disparaging comment about how he’d already been organised enough to take his son shopping for school supplies but that Scorpius would love to accompany them nonetheless and thanking Harry and Albus for the invitation. They’d Flooed into the Leaky Cauldron to find an excited Scorpius and a bemused Draco, who sent Scorpius off with a brief hug, promising to pick him up later.

That had been several hours ago and Harry was now in a cafe with his daughter, a large coffee and an enormous slab of Victoria sponge he could have sworn he was going to say no to. Lily nibbled at the cake, sipped the Frappuccino she’d ordered and chattered away. His school essentials purchased, Albus had long since shaken him off and was somewhere in the alley with Scorpius and strict instructions to stay there.

It had been a very successful morning. Albus had only needed new robes and a couple of new books for his NEWT subjects; Harry gave him some gold to top up his own potions kit, knowing they’d be in the Apothecary for hours otherwise. Lily had asked no less than seventeen times for another pygmy puff and had spent almost half an hour choosing some new hair accessories which coordinated with her Hogwarts robes but didn’t clash with her hair.

Harry’s serene bubble of success was burst when an irate looking Draco Malfoy appeared in the coffee shop, bypassed the counter and took about three strides to approach Harry, his expression furious.

“Potter, what did you do?”

Lily snorted into her slice of cake and Harry threw her a warning look.

“What’s the matter?” Harry gestured to the spare chair at their table but Draco did not sit down.

“Do you know where our sons have been?”

[[MORE]]

Harry was confused. Was Draco annoyed at him for letting Albus and Scorpius off on their own? Scorpius was only months away from turning seventeen and it wasn’t like they were off gallivanting around muggle London together, the alley was very safe. But Harry was suddenly worried he’d misjudged the situation and that Draco would never have let Scorpius leave by himself.

“Look, I’m sorry, Draco, but they were getting bored of me hanging around and where they’re both almost of age, I thought it would be okay if-“ Harry stopped. “Hang on, what are you doing here anyway?”

“I happened to have tasks to complete here,” Draco said cryptically. “I saw Scorpius and Albus as I was passing.”

“Draco, it’s very safe here, and-“

“No, Potter, that’s not where my concern lies.”

“Where does your concern lie?” Harry asked warily.

“I have just seen Scorpius and your son leaving a tattoo shop.” He left a dramatic pause.

Lily gasped gleefully. “Ooh is Albus getting a tattoo? Can I get one, Dad?”

“What?” Harry stared at Draco in confusion. “Albus wouldn’t have got a tattoo, would he, Lil?”

Lily shrugged and ate some more cake.

“Maybe it would be wise to check what they’re up to?” Draco gestured for them to leave and Harry looked at Lily.

“I want to see!” she cried enthusiastically.

“There won’t be anything to see, Albus hasn’t got a tattoo. He hasn’t,” Harry insisted.

“Maybe Scorpius has, then,” Lily said off handedly and Draco turned pink.

“No, no, Scorpius has not…” Draco muttered to himself reassuringly, striding along the cobbled street determinedly.

Draco was on such a mission that he didn’t notice Albus sat outside Florean Fortescue’s giving them a cheery wave.

“Oh hi, Dad, Lil. Hello, Mr Malfoy.” He smiled innocently while all three of them scrutinised him for evidence of a tattoo. “What?” he asked in concern after a second, playing with his hair like there might be something wrong with it and that’s what they were all staring at.

“Er, what have you been up to?” Harry asked jovially.

Albus shrugged. “Been here and there, now we’re getting milkshakes.”

“Here and there…” Draco muttered.

“Um,” Harry cleared his throat, “Draco seems to think he saw you and Scorpius leaving a tattoo parlour.”

“What tattoo did you get, Al?” Lily cried happily, joining him at the small table. “Show me! Or was it Scorpius?” She got up on her knees to try and look inside the ice cream shop.

Albus laughed. “Nobody got a tattoo.”

Harry relaxed and he saw Draco’s tense shoulders release slightly.

“What were you doing in that shop then?”

Albus shrugged. “Scor got his tongue pierced.”

Harry felt his stomach drop, his heart stop and his face redden. Draco would never, ever forgive him for this. Harry chanced a glance over at his old school enemy, now sort of friend. Probably not friend anymore.

“You took my son to get his tongue pierced?!”

It wasn’t clear whether the question was aimed at Harry or Albus, but as Albus was his son, Harry felt told off either way.

“Why did… how… how did that happen?” Harry was willing Albus with his eyes not to say he’d talked Scorpius into it.

Albus shrugged again, the epitome of nonchalance. “He’s wanted it done for ages.”

Draco spluttered in protest. “He’s never expressed any desire to do that before!”

At that moment, Scorpius emerged from the shop with a milkshake in each hand. He set them down at the table with a cheerful grin, which quickly turned to mild confusion when he spotted his dad’s expression. Harry wondered if Scorpius had deliberately waited for today to go off and do this without his dad being able to stop him.

“Hi, Dad. What are you doing here?”

Scorpius looked breezy and casual, no trace of guilt or suspicion on his face. Harry watched his tongue as he talked, looking for the flash of silver.

“Scorpius,” Draco spluttered again, apparently unable to say anything else.

Scorpius glanced at Albus who looked blank then at Lily, who was gazing at Scorpius in impressed admiration. Harry hoped she wasn’t getting any ideas.

“Albus told your dad what you did,” Harry said when it didn’t look like anybody was going to say anything.

“What I… did?” Scorpius looked anguished, as if he were trying to work out what he’d done wrong. He was gaping a bit in confusion and, almost immediately, it was clearly visible that he didn’t have a tongue piercing.

It was then that he realised that - while he was appraising Scorpius - Draco was watching Albus. Albus, who was now sipping his milkshake with a poorly concealed grin on his face, as if he were about to burst out laughing. Because Scorpius hadn’t pierced his tongue at all.

Harry looked from his son to his old rival, something passing between them which he wasn’t fully reading. Draco raised his eyebrows, then smirked, just with the corner of his mouth. Albus winked at him and the two gave almost identical snorts of laughter.

“Can someone explain to me what’s going on?” Lily said in a loud, bored voice.

“I think maybe it’s a Slytherin thing,” Harry commented, grinning at Albus.

Scorpius cleared his throat. “Hello, yes, um, I’m a Slytherin too and I’m also a bit lost.”

“Why were you in a tattoo shop then?” Draco asked Albus.

“Seeing how much it would cost to get my ears pierced, can’t go on my own until I’m seventeen anyway.” Albus fiddled with his ear lobe experimentally. “Can I do it, Dad?”

“Er, let’s discuss it at home with your mum,” Harry said non-commitally.

“I told you he’d say that,” Albus said quietly to Scorpius.

“What did you tell my dad I did?” Scorpius was still stuck in mild confusion. “Dad?” He turned to Draco.

“You knew I’d say that?” Harry pressed Albus. “We’ve never talked about it before.”

“Nothing, Scorpius. Just Albus’ idea of a hilarious joke.” Draco spoke at the same time.

“So Scorpius didn’t get his tongue pierced? Dad, can I get my tongue pierced?” Lily interrupted.

Scorpius’ face was a picture as it dawned on him what Albus had said.

summary: Harry Potter character personal headcanons – Marauders era
title: Harry Potter character personal headcanons – Marauders era
body:
James

Race: Some kind of Asian. Common headcanon is that he’s Indian, so let’s go with that.
Sexuality: Straight, and very surprised to find out that none of the other Marauders are 
Ship(s): Lily. 
If I should ship him with someone else, it would probably be an OC.
In an AU where he was into guys, I could see him with Sirius, too.
Nope ship(s): Haven’t really seen him paired up with anyone but Lily, tbh… but any ship with a large age gap. I’m not very fond of James/Snape either.
Platonic ship(s): The Marauders. I like to think he was close to Frank, Alice, Kingsley, Moody, Marlene McKinnon, Mary MacDougal etc. too.
Disability/ies: From what we see of him, he could have ADHD. Idk tho.

Lily

Race: Isn’t she explicitly described as “pale and rosecheeked” or something like that? Yeah, pretty sure she’s white (also, Petunia is blonde and blue-eyed, so yeah)
Sexuality: Demiromantic bisexual. She can easily find people attractive, but she doesn’t develop romantic feelings before a few years at least
Ship(s): James.
In an AU where he stayed a spoiled brat and she wouldn’t want to date him, I could see her with either Remus or one of her female friends.
Nope ship(s): Believe it or not, I have seen people ship her with Slughorn (!)
I really don’t ship Snily. It wouldn’t be good for any of them. I don’t think I have to explain why, as we see that even their friendship wasn’t completely healthy.
Platonic ship(s): I think she was close to the other Marauders, as well as her female friends (and of course Kingsley, Moody etc.)
In an AU where Snape didn’t hang out with people who wanted Lily dead, I think they could have had a beautiful friendship. But well…
Disability/ies: None that I can think of…

Sirius

Race: Mixed. I think he has some white, and some Asian (perhaps Filipino or Sri Lankan) and maybe some Hispanic, too. Idk.
Sexuality: Asexual homoromantic. 
Ship(s): Remus. In an AU where they both survive, ofc. And perhaps they dated a little in their Hogwarts years, before all that war stuff distracted them. Idk. 
In an AU where James was into guys, I could see them dating, too.
Another ship I’d love to explore is Sirius/Kingsley. (Kingsley is into guys, right? Let’s say he is.) I think it’d be fun to have the slightly immature rebellious guy and the ambitious, serious guy… just… date each other. Yeah.
A crack ship I could sort of see is Sirius/Lucius. I mean… wouldn’t it be hilarious?
Nope ship(s): I have, of course, seen him paired up with most of the Lightning Generation (yes, including Draco and Neville. Yikes) and that’s just… too big of an age gap, especially since most of them were minors when he died.
I’ve also seen him paired up with Regulus and all of the Black Sisters, which is just… plain wrong!
I don’t like Sirius/Snape that much either.
Platonic ship(s): All of da Marauders (if he isn’t dating any of them, that is). And of course Lily and the rest of the friend group.
Disability/ies: Isn’t it pretty obvious that he has depression and probably PTSD after Azkaban? He didn’t really seem all that normal in his youth either – werewolf prank, anyone? But considering the parents he grew up with, it doesn’t surprise me that he would be a bit fucked up, even if he didn’t realise it.

Remus

Race: White
Sexuality: Either bi or pan. You know what, I think he’s pan.
And he’s also a trans boy. He realised he was a dude a while after he was bitten, and that’s why he chose that name.
Ship(s): I do like him with Tonks.
But I also kinda ship him with Sirius.
I could also see him with Lily, if she didn’t date James.
Nope ship(s): Any ship with a large age difference, tbh. 
(Tonks is on thin fucking ice, but the fact that she was was into her twenties when they started dating, and that their relationship arc is so freaking cute, makes the ice a bit thicker)
Oh, and especially Greyback! Why do some people ship this?
Platonic ship(s): Marauders! (if he doesn’t date Sirius, then they’re brotp)
And the rest of the friend group, like I described above
Disability/ies: He seems to have some sort of social anxiety?
And definitely depression. He needed to take some meds!

Peter

Race: White
Sexuality: Gay mess. Probably had a big crush on James and Sirius during their school time. (i have a crack headcanon that he switched side because he thought young!TomRiddle was hotter than his friends)
Ship(s): Idk… can’t really see him with anyone, tbh. Perhaps an oc? Someone who could boost his morality and confidence. Kinda like Ginny, but male and from his generation.
Nope ship(s): Anything pædo. Don’t really ship him with death eaters, either. 
Platonic ship(s): The Marauders and Lily, Kingsley etc. before he betrayed them. But well…
Disability/ies: Perhaps some kind of anxiety?

Snape

Race: He reads as a mixed dude to me. Probably some white, perhaps also some Asian. Maybe he has descendants from multiple Asian countries? I like the idea of him having some Korean and Middle Eastern. Yeah.
Sexuality: It’s common to headcanon him as ace. I don’t see why he couldn’t be, so let’s just say he is.
I don’t think he’s into guys, so heteroromantic?
I’ve also seen people headcanon him as Not Cis. But whether he’s a trans boy, non-binary, intersex, or something completely different? Idk. I do like the idea of him being intersex and non-binary, but alright with he/him pronouns (whether that would make him a non-binary and/or he/him lesbian… i won’t go into that, since i’m not lesbian myself)
Ship(s): If I should pick a canon character, I’d pick Narcissa. That unbreakable vow chapter made me realise how cute they’d be together, and after a reread/rewatch, you realise that they were both primarily driven (and arguably redeemed) by love.
If not, then probably an oc of some kind. 
Nope ship(s): So many… but first: any pædo ship. It’s common to ship him with Harry and Hermione, both of which are very wrong (especially the Snarry ship, but since the Snamione ship has sexist undertones…) And Dumbledore and Voldemort (I’ve seen fanart for both… I wish I hadn’t)
But also Lily (for aforementioned reasons) and James and Sirius.
Platonic ship(s): Lily, if he could stop that racism before it was too late.
And I like the idea of him and Luna sort of befriending each other, as long as he stops being mean to Neville (bc she wouldn’t tolerate that bullshit)
Disability/ies: Um, depression? Definitely.
He does seem to have some Autistic traits, too. His intovercy/introvertiness/whatever and his deep interest in stuff. Also how he can sometimes act slightly… clingy towards Lily (I’m autistic, and I tend to be pretty clingy in periods where I only have one friend)

I’ve also seen him paired up with Regulus and all of the Black Sisters, which is just… plain wrong!
I don’t like Sirius/Snape that much either.
Platonic ship(s): All of da Marauders (if he isn’t dating any of them, that is). And of course Lily and the rest of the friend group.
Disability/ies: Isn’t it pretty obvious that he has depression and probably PTSD after Azkaban? He didn’t really seem all that normal in his youth either – werewolf prank, anyone? But considering the parents he grew up with, it doesn’t surprise me that he would be a bit fucked up, even if he didn’t realise it.

Remus

Race: White
Sexuality: Either bi or pan. You know what, I think he’s pan.
And he’s also a trans boy. He realised he was a dude a while after he was bitten, and that’s why he chose that name.
Ship(s): I do like him with Tonks.
But I also kinda ship him with Sirius.
I could also see him with Lily, if she didn’t date James.
Nope ship(s): Any ship with a large age difference, tbh. 
(Tonks is on thin fucking ice, but the fact that she was was into her twenties when they started dating, and that their relationship arc is so freaking cute, makes the ice a bit thicker)
Oh, and especially Greyback! Why do some people ship this?
Platonic ship(s): Marauders! (if he doesn’t date Sirius, then they’re brotp)
And the rest of the friend group, like I described above
Disability/ies: He seems to have some sort of social anxiety?
And definitely depression. He needed to take some meds!

Peter

Race: White
Sexuality: Gay mess. Probably had a big crush on James and Sirius during their school time. (i have a crack headcanon that he switched side because he thought young!TomRiddle was hotter than his friends)
Ship(s): Idk… can’t really see him with anyone, tbh. Perhaps an oc? Someone who could boost his morality and confidence. Kinda like Ginny, but male and from his generation.
Nope ship(s): Anything pædo. Don’t really ship him with death eaters, either. 
Platonic ship(s): The Marauders and Lily, Kingsley etc. before he betrayed them. But well…
Disability/ies: Perhaps some kind of anxiety?

Snape

Race: He reads as a mixed dude to me. Probably some white, perhaps also some Asian. Maybe he has descendants from multiple Asian countries? I like the idea of him having some Korean and Middle Eastern. Yeah.
Sexuality: It’s common to headcanon him as ace. I don’t see why he couldn’t be, so let’s just say he is.
I don’t think he’s into guys, so heteroromantic?
I’ve also seen people headcanon him as Not Cis. But whether he’s a trans boy, non-binary, intersex, or something completely different? Idk. I do like the idea of him being intersex and non-binary, but alright with he/him pronouns (whether that would make him a non-binary and/or he/him lesbian… i won’t go into that, since i’m not lesbian myself)
Ship(s): If I should pick a canon character, I’d pick Narcissa. That unbreakable vow chapter made me realise how cute they’d be together, and after a reread/rewatch, you realise that they were both primarily driven (and arguably redeemed) by love.
If not, then probably an oc of some kind. 
Nope ship(s): So many… but first: any pædo ship. It’s common to ship him with Harry and Hermione, both of which are very wrong (especially the Snarry ship, but since the Snamione ship has sexist undertones…) And Dumbledore and Voldemort (I’ve seen fanart for both… I wish I hadn’t)
But also Lily (for aforementioned reasons) and James and Sirius.
Platonic ship(s): Lily, if he could stop that racism before it was too late.
And I like the idea of him and Luna sort of befriending each other, as long as he stops being mean to Neville (bc she wouldn’t tolerate that bullshit)
Disability/ies: Um, depression? Definitely.
He does seem to have some Autistic traits, too. His intovercy/introvertiness/whatever and his deep interest in stuff. Also how he can sometimes act slightly… clingy towards Lily (I’m autistic, and I tend to be pretty clingy in periods where I only have one friend)

Nope ship(s): Haven’t really seen him paired up with anyone but Lily, tbh… but any ship with a large age gap. I’m not very fond of James/Snape either.
Platonic ship(s): The Marauders. I like to think he was close to Frank, Alice, Kingsley, Moody, Marlene McKinnon, Mary MacDougal etc. too.
Disability/ies: From what we see of him, he could have ADHD. Idk tho.

Lily

WICꞰED: adult based wizarding world

 With the wizarding world entering the “modern age” came the inevitable tension between...
caption:
WICꞰED: adult based wizarding world

With the wizarding world entering the “modern age” came the inevitable tension between pureblood conservatives and those embracing the change. The Ministry has become a zoo of radical ideas on how the wizarding world should be. 

People looking to blame someone for the new modern age monstrosity are starting to point fingers – most of them towards muggleborns.

WIKI + PLOT + RULES + CANONS + FACES + WANTED

summary: Elenco australiano de Cursed Child fala sobre suas experiências com o Mundo Bruxo
title: Elenco australiano de Cursed Child fala sobre suas experiências com o Mundo Bruxo
description:
Em entrevista ao jornal The Sydney Morning Herald, o elenco australiano de Harry Potter and The Cursed Child falou sobre suas experiências com o Mundo Bruxo e sobre como conseguiram os papéis para a peça.

Alvo Potter
Sean Rees-Wemyss, que interpretará o filho de Harry Potter e Gina Weasley, atua desde os seis anos. O ator estava pensando em abandonar a carreira quando recebeu um e-mail de seu agente recomendando que ele se inscrevesse para o elenco da peça.
O ator então participou de várias audições para o papel. “Para minha audição final, eles me mandaram para Londres para que eu me apresentasse para o John Tiffany [diretor original da peça] e Sonia Friedman [produtora da peça no Reno Unido] e eu senti como se fosse um completo círculo poético”, disse o ator. Em julho do ano passado ele finalmente recebeu a resposta positiva. “Sou um grande fã de Harry Potter. Meu gato chama Hermione”, revelou Rees-Wemyss

Escórpio Malfoy
William McKenna, que dará vida à Escórpio Malfoy, estava no último ano do ensino médio quando descobriu que tinha conseguido o papel. O ator teve que manter segredo até que o elenco fosse oficialmente anunciado em setembro do ano passado. “Obviamente minha família sabia, mas ter que esconder dos meus melhores amigos, enquanto todo mundo está perguntando o que você fará no ano seguinte e falando sobre ano sabático e coisas assim, com certeza não foi fácil.”, disse o ator.
McKenna também é um grande fã dos livros e dos filmes do Mundo Bruxo. “Tem um vídeo meu e do meu primo, quando tínhamos seis anos, com gravetos como se fossem varinhas, correndo por uma casa de veraneio e gritando feitiços um no outro, é uma das memórias mais carinhosas que eu tenho”, revelou o ator.

Rosa Granger-Weasley
Manali Datar, descobriu que tinha sido escalada para interpretar a filha de Rony e Hermione um dia antes de seu aniversário. A atriz, porém, não pode revelar nada durante sua festa. “Eu não podia contar para ninguém, o que foi realmente dificil. Mas foi legal ter todos os meus amigos ao meu redor e saber que eu tinha esse grupo de suporte”, disse ela.

A escalação de Datar, que nasceu na Índia, segue a tradição estabelecida em Londres de promover a diversidade na escalação para os papéis de Rose e Hermione. “Quando soube sobre isso [audição para a peça], eu pensei ‘Isso é algo que eu amaria assistir’, ter alguém da minha idade, ou garotas mais novas, indo ao teatro e se vendo representada no palco”, ela diz. “Me sinto grata por ter a oportunidade de estar em um show que seja tão inovador”.

Harry Potter and the Cursed Child estréia no Princess Theatre, em Melbourne na Austrália em 23 de fevereiro de 2019 com previews a partir de 18 de janeiro. Mais informações no site oficial da peça.

Leia mais:
+ Em Nova York, Cursed Child arrecadou quase dez milhões de reais na última semana de dezembro
+ Elenco original de Harry Potter and the Cursed Child deixará Broadway em março

The post Elenco australiano de Cursed Child fala sobre suas experiências com o Mundo Bruxo appeared first on Potterish.com.

trail.content_raw:
Em entrevista ao jornal The Sydney Morning Herald, o elenco australiano de Harry Potter and The Cursed Child falou sobre suas experiências com o Mundo Bruxo e sobre como conseguiram os papéis para a peça.

Alvo Potter
Sean Rees-Wemyss, que interpretará o filho de Harry Potter e Gina Weasley, atua desde os seis anos. O ator estava pensando em abandonar a carreira quando recebeu um e-mail de seu agente recomendando que ele se inscrevesse para o elenco da peça.
O ator então participou de várias audições para o papel. “Para minha audição final, eles me mandaram para Londres para que eu me apresentasse para o John Tiffany [diretor original da peça] e Sonia Friedman [produtora da peça no Reno Unido] e eu senti como se fosse um completo círculo poético”, disse o ator. Em julho do ano passado ele finalmente recebeu a resposta positiva. “Sou um grande fã de Harry Potter. Meu gato chama Hermione”, revelou Rees-Wemyss

Escórpio Malfoy
William McKenna, que dará vida à Escórpio Malfoy, estava no último ano do ensino médio quando descobriu que tinha conseguido o papel. O ator teve que manter segredo até que o elenco fosse oficialmente anunciado em setembro do ano passado. “Obviamente minha família sabia, mas ter que esconder dos meus melhores amigos, enquanto todo mundo está perguntando o que você fará no ano seguinte e falando sobre ano sabático e coisas assim, com certeza não foi fácil.”, disse o ator.
McKenna também é um grande fã dos livros e dos filmes do Mundo Bruxo. “Tem um vídeo meu e do meu primo, quando tínhamos seis anos, com gravetos como se fossem varinhas, correndo por uma casa de veraneio e gritando feitiços um no outro, é uma das memórias mais carinhosas que eu tenho”, revelou o ator.

Rosa Granger-Weasley
Manali Datar, descobriu que tinha sido escalada para interpretar a filha de Rony e Hermione um dia antes de seu aniversário. A atriz, porém, não pode revelar nada durante sua festa. “Eu não podia contar para ninguém, o que foi realmente dificil. Mas foi legal ter todos os meus amigos ao meu redor e saber que eu tinha esse grupo de suporte”, disse ela.

A escalação de Datar, que nasceu na Índia, segue a tradição estabelecida em Londres de promover a diversidade na escalação para os papéis de Rose e Hermione. “Quando soube sobre isso [audição para a peça], eu pensei ‘Isso é algo que eu amaria assistir’, ter alguém da minha idade, ou garotas mais novas, indo ao teatro e se vendo representada no palco”, ela diz. “Me sinto grata por ter a oportunidade de estar em um show que seja tão inovador”.

Harry Potter and the Cursed Child estréia no Princess Theatre, em Melbourne na Austrália em 23 de fevereiro de 2019 com previews a partir de 18 de janeiro. Mais informações no site oficial da peça.

Leia mais:

+ Elenco original de Harry Potter and the Cursed Child deixará Broadway em março

body:
Forever & Always {songfic}

(gif is not mine)

a/n: this is very random, the idea just came up lol

disclaimer: a little angst, a little fluff at the end? idk

pairing: remus lupin x reader

song: Forever & Always by Zeph (it is available on Apple Music, Spotify and I believe Pandora and Soundcloud)

summary: remus is very worried that once you know about his ‘furry little problem’, you would turn your back to him after a year of loving you.

—–

honey now we’re older, but we’ll never age

Remus fiddled with his fingers nervously while waiting for you to come and meet him under a specific tree near the Black Lake, the tree where both of you sat under at your very first date a year ago. He smiled to himself absent-mindedly.

Both of you are 16 now, and he thought you should- no, you need to know about his 'furry little problem’, as James had called it. But it had took him so long to pluck up the courage to tell you about it because he was scared. He was scared of losing you. And after a while of thinking, he knows that it was for the best. If he were to keep it much longer, and when you find out - by the time he had fallen more in love with you - you would abandon him. And he loved you to much for that.

“Hello, Remus. Why do you look so nervous?” you suddenly greeted him, making him jump a little. You chuckled at his nervousness.

“Hi, (y/n). I…” he paused, not being able to continue. he looked at you directly in the eyes. You noticed that his eyes are now pooled with tears. “I have something so important to tell you.” tears started to stream down his face. Remus was never one to cry in front of people.

You looked at him, feeling extremely worried. “Yeah? What is it?” you said softly, wiping away his tears. You took his hand into yours, putting it to your chest. “It’s okay. You can tell me anything.” Remus smiled weakly at that, as if your words are giving him strenght to continue.

i don’t think my love will ever start to fade away

“Please, (y/n), don’t be mad at me for not telling you this from the start?” you nodded, caressing his cheeks, calming him down a little. Taking a deep breath, he started, “I love you, (y/n). I really do. I love you so fucking much it hurts to tell you this. Please don’t hate me after I tell you this, but I- I am a Werewolf, (y/n).” his voice broke at that last sentence, as well as his heart.

You looked at him, eyes wide. Unlike what Remus had thought, you didn’t let go of his hand, instead bringing him into your arms. “Remus…” you hugged him tightly, tears now streaming down your face as well, wetting Remus’ jumper. “I can never hate you, Remus. For everything you’ve done for me? It’s ridiculous to hate you.”

“But (y/n),” Remus pulled away, a sad smile was plastered on his face, he continued, “I’m a monster. I’m not a person who you should fall in love with. Not anymore.”

my attachment to you isn’t subject to change

“Do you know how it feels when the person you love the most tells you that you shouldn’t love them?” you asked him, suddenly feeling angry. Remus didn’t answer, so you continued. “It fucking hurts, Remus. How much love I have for you will never, never change. I love you. If you trust me, you know I don’t have to say it twice.” you forced a smile at him, trying to be strong. Does he not trust you? Does he not know just how much you love him?

“I’m sorry, (y/n). I thought you would- you would turn your back from me, leave me. I’m so sorry, (y/n). I swear to Merlin I trust you. I just don’t want you to regret your decisions with me later on.” he slowly, as if hesitating, pulled you into a warm hug.

“I will never regret anything with you, Remus. In fact, I longed for more moments with you. My heart is forever and always yours, Remus Lupin.” you said, and you felt Remus smiling. You pulled away, giving him a quick peck on the lips before pulling him up from the ground and walked back to the castle together. The walk to the castle was filled with laughter, flashbacks and kisses.

Only God knows how much you love him.

my heart’s yours forever and always

—–

a/n: aaaa dorks. i love this song so much, by the way. it’s such a sweet and calming song. anyways, i hope you liked this!

love, tina <3

Release Date: 2015-11-20
Genre: Action & Adventure
Size: 84.54 MB

Link Download : https://cair.pro/harrypotteredition

Description

“Turning the envelope over, his hand trembling, Harry saw a purple wax seal bearing a coat of arms; a lion, an eagle, a badger and a snake surrounding a large letter ‘H’.”

Harry Potter has never even heard of Hogwarts when the letters start dropping on the doormat at number four, Privet Drive. Addressed in green ink on yellowish parchment with a purple seal, they are swiftly confiscated by his grisly aunt and uncle. Then, on Harry’s eleventh birthday, a great beetle-eyed giant of a man called Rubeus Hagrid bursts in with some astonishing news: Harry Potter is a wizard, and he has a place at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. An incredible adventure is about to begin!

Addressed in green ink on yellowish parchment with a purple seal, they are swiftly confiscated by his grisly aunt and uncle. Then, on Harry’s eleventh birthday, a great beetle-eyed giant of a man called Rubeus Hagrid bursts in with some astonishing news: Harry Potter is a wizard, and he has a place at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. An incredible adventure is about to begin!

body:
Lucifer didn’t know what was going on.

One moment he was trying to escape the cage, the next he was in the mind of a seven year old, and by the looks of it, an abused seven year old.

body:
Lucifer didn’t know what was going on.

One moment he was trying to escape the cage, the next he was in the body of a 15-month-old baby, who, for some reason, was in a destroyed room.

Note:

It’s requested to have Dumbledore and Snape Bashing, along with a not so happy Heavenly family about the stuff Dumbledore and Snape did/do.
